cast.name: 娜塔莉亚·奥希波娃 Natalia Osipova

director.name: 肯尼斯·麦克米兰 Kenneth MacMillan

trans_title: 英国皇家芭蕾舞团: 玛侬
introduction: This adaptation of Abbé Prévost’s novel embodies Kenneth MacMillan at his best, his acute insight into human psychology and his mastery of narrative choreography finding full expression in the impassioned duets of the central couple, visceral and urgent in their desire. The heroine’s struggle to escape poverty make Manon one of the most dramatic and devastating of ballets, emphasized by Nicholas Georgiadis’ evocative designs that reflect the juxtaposition between Manon’s impoverished origins and the lavish world she longs to inhabit. The 2023/24 Season celebrates the centenary of Nicholas Georgiadis.
chinese_title: 英国皇家芭蕾舞团: 玛侬
